Author: PStamatiou
Content: speaking of how to, how can I create a discussion page like this that is on the homepage?

Author: henryw
Content: I wanted something that just makes all the basic CRUD pages for me without having to installing anything, so I made this. Basically, you create your table in phpMyAdmin and paste your table export SQL into it, and it makes all the pages for you. Hopefully it'll be a time saver you for guys using PHP.

Author: henryw
Title: PHP Online CRUD Scaffold File Maker (Paste Export Table SQL)
